front.title: Problem Statement and Requirements of Peer-to-Peer Streaming Protocol (PPSP)

abstract.t: Peer-to-Peer (P2P for short) streaming systems show more and more popularity in current Internet with proprietary protocols. This document identifies problems of the proprietary protocols, proposes the development of Peer to Peer Streaming Protocol (PPSP) including the tracker and peer protocol, and discusses the scope, requirements and use cases of PPSP.
